name: HEX code detection variants
content:
HEX code with numbers in it: #F0F0F0

HEX code with letters only: #FAFAFA

Works without a # in front of the code: FFF000

ISSUE : works also with a "7, HEX code" ???: FFF FFFAA FFFBBBC FFFBBBCDE, etc.
        #FFF #FFFAA #FFFBBBC #FFFBBBCDE, etc.
		  
/#?([\da-fA-F]{2})([\da-fA-F]{2})([\da-fA-F]{2})/g


Variantes :

/#?([\da-fA-F]{2})([\da-fA-F]{2})([\da-fA-F]{2})/g

/#?(([\da-f]{2}){3})/ig
/#?(([\dA-F]{2}){3})/ig
/#?(([0-9a-f]{2}){3})/ig
/#?(([0-9A-F]{2}){3})/ig
author: Étienne Moreau
